channel.title: Developing on Scratch Addons
channel.description: Recent content in Developing on Scratch Addons

item.title: Adding an Icon to a Setting Name
item.description: To add an icon to a setting name without causing crashes, Make sure the icon file name does not contain hyphens Write @ICONFILENAME.svg setting name on addon.json Add ICONFILENAME.svg at /images/icons/ if missing Edit /background/load-addon-manifests.js to add iconfilenameIcon: "@ICONFILENAME.svg", Edit /addons/scratch-notifier/background.js for Scratch Notifier settings
